comment: In a conjunctive normal form a pair of nodes like ` ( ph \/ ps ) /\ ( -. ph \/ ch ) ` eliminates the need of a node ` ( ps \/ ch ) ` . This theorem allows simplifications in that respect. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 20-Jun-2020.)
